title: Agonizingly Close: Pidcock, Stuyven, Gee ‘Gutted’ By Near-Misses on Tour de France Gravel Epic
content:
In a sport where winning is the only thing that counts, three riders struggled to make sense of the finish-line disappointment: 'I saw the line, I saw clean air and I thought, I’ve got this.'

Read the full article at Agonizingly Close: Pidcock, Stuyven, Gee ‘Gutted’ By Near-Misses on Tour de France Gravel Epic on Velo.
author: ahood
